abstract: A custom identification string for the current type.
overview:
## Discussion

The string you return from this property must be unique among your app’s custom message types. When you send a message, [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupSessionMessenger] includes this string in the data it sends to other devices. When it receives a message, [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupSessionMessenger] creates the type that contains the matching string in this property.

# messageIdentifier

**Type Property**

A custom identification string for the current type.

## Declaration

```swift
static var messageIdentifier: String { get }
```

## Discussion

The string you return from this property must be unique among your app’s custom message types. When you send a message, [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupSessionMessenger] includes this string in the data it sends to other devices. When it receives a message, [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupSessionMessenger] creates the type that contains the matching string in this property.
title: messageIdentifier
